about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Puzzle & Maze, an action puzzle game where you'll experience a journey filled with challenges. While the core gameplay revolves around numeric puzzles, each stage is packed with various enemies and traps.

As you open boxes, your Power level increases. However, if the Power level of the box is higher than that of the player, the box remains closed. Similarly, when facing enemies, your Power level must surpass theirs to eliminate them. Get ready to overcome diverse enemies, challenging bosses, and various trials as you progress through each stage.

Embark on this adventure and conquer the Puzzle & Maze world!
detailed_description:
Welcome to the world of Puzzle & Maze, an action puzzle game where you'll experience a journey filled with challenges. While the core gameplay revolves around numeric puzzles, each stage is packed with various enemies and traps.

As you open boxes, your Power level increases. However, if the Power level of the box is higher than that of the player, the box remains closed. Similarly, when facing enemies, your Power level must surpass theirs to eliminate them. Get ready to overcome diverse enemies, challenging bosses, and various trials as you progress through each stage.

Embark on this adventure and conquer the Puzzle & Maze world!
name: Puzzle & Maze

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL capable graphics card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: In this game, you'll encounter a straightforward combat system and a plethora of traps and puzzles. The combat mechanics are simple yet engaging, requiring strategic thinking. Your character's success in battles depends on the comparison of Power levels.
